name: Board Studios
overview:
Board Studios is a US-based corporation that specializes in short and witty ‘explainer’ animations in the popular formats of motion graphics, cartoon, and hand-drawn scribing.

The company was founded by entrepreneurs out of frustration with the high costs and long lead times involved in creating cool, hand-drawn animations for their companies. They partnered with experienced creatives to innovate the production process, resulting in improved quality, shorter timeframes, and much lower cost. With a streamlined process and lean infrastructure, Board Studios passes on the cost savings to its clients.

Clients have used Board Studios animations on their home pages, for advertising campaigns (email, YouTube, and TV), and for internal corporate communications (communicating new processes across departments or for motivational company-wide meetings).

Board Studios has worked with clients in a wide variety of industries in order to explain simple products to complex financial services, and with clients ranging from pre-revenue startups in fundraising mode to small businesses launching a new product to large multinationals.

The Board Studios team works hard and passionately on each and every video with the goal of making every video special and exceeding client expectations.
